P-4 P4112 Skyline RS Turbo (DR30)

Like many other American celebrities before and after him, Paul newman starred in Japanese commercials. In Newman's case, he was selling Nissan Skylines. The fact that Newman raced for Nissan during the late '70s and early '80s helped with his appeal. There was even a special R30 version named the Paul Newman Version which was a top spec GT-ES turbo with signature embroidery and decals.



What we have here from P-4, is the DR30 seen in one of Newman's commercials:
https://youtu.be/M6M2X6IhIqo?t=2m4s
